1113.content:
Axel was walking around the area as volcanic ash spewed around him. If it wasn't for the fact that Satan wasn't there that you would think he just went to hell. He looked at the flames and he thought to himself "Why am I wasting time here?" He recalls finding the rogue member and then a bright flash and then suddenly he was here. He looked around for anything he can use to find that man but nothing turns up. He then saw a vague image of an echidna who said "You've arrived just as I anticipated." The figure made herself more clearer and she was revealed to be an echidna with ancient clothing. Axel wondered who she was but he said "You knew I was coming?" The echidna simply nodded.

Axel reflects on what has happened and says "Do you know where I can find a blood red echidna?" The female echidna replied "Why would you want to know where he is?" Axel was about to say his reason but then he thought about it. Was it really a reason or an excuse? He pondered this and said "I want to avenge my team." The echidna looked at him with sad eyes and said "I'm afraid that determination like that will not help you defeat him." Axel gets angry and asks "What do you mean!?" The echidna replies "You have a reason based off of anger but that's really not a reason but more of an excuse."

Axel was pissed now. He has a good reason to take this guy down so why is this reason more of an excuse!? He wanted to know and he asked "What's makes you think its an excuse!?" The echidna replies "Simply because I can say this, what would you do after you defeat him? Did you not say you lost your team? Who would you return to then? Name: Eve

Playstyle: 'Metal Menace'(Eve is a mixture of both close-range and long-range (V-Max Overdrive, Bionic Lancer, Chainsaw Claw, 180 Kick, Drill Charge, Neo Spin(a close-range tornado), Jump, and her fists and feet for close-range. Missiles Massacre, Laser Bazooka, Rocket Punch, Magma Shotgun, Arctic Spear, and Cannon Shot for long range) She has to switch between the two(Melee Mode and Range Mode respectively, unless she is in EX Mode)

Description: Eve looks similar to Metal Sonic, but has four different things: Her eyes are green, not red. Her body is white(she also wears a shirt and pants.) She will talk to people if she has the time, and most of all she is a Warrior of Cosmos.

Bio: Born in the lab of Shinra as a prototype, her life there was both painful and short-lived. After three years of torture, Eve finally found the courage to run away. In her escape, she killed 50 SOLDIERS, thus marking her a fugitive. After 10 years of running from Shinra, she found salvation in 7th Heaven. She walk in there, broken and near death when, she saw a brown echidna(Barret). She said, with her remaining strength, "Help.", before fainting. She woke up, tied down somewhere. She easily got loose but before she could escape, "Where do you think you're going, Little Missy?" a gruff voice said. She quickly turned around, weapon drawn, to see the echidna from before. "I'm sorry Mr-" "Wallace. Barret Wallace." "-Mr.Wallace, but I-" Eve tried to explain before she saw that he had a mechanical cannon drawn at her as well. "You're like-" "You? As if I would work with Shinra!" "Wait, you're against Shinra too?!" Eve shouted. "So?" "I could help you!" Eve quickly explained, seeing this man had a short temper. 'This thing wants to help us? Well, any kind of help is better than none.' The echidna thought to himself before lowering his weapon down, Eve as well. "I'm Eve, Prototype SOLDIER at your service!" Eve proudly said. "Listen you! If you cause even a little trouble, I will personally tear you apart! Understand?!" Barret threateningly said to Eve. "Got it." "Good. Welcome to AVALANCHE." Barret said to her. Thus, the beginning of a trust that quickly grew from a spark to a inferno. She welcomed, along with Barret, Cloud. Her trust with Cloud was rocky to say the least.

How she got here: Eve heard in her dreams a voice that said, "Young one, if your hearing this, then you were chosen to help turn the tide of battle in a war. If you accept, you shall be taken from here. Time will stop until you return. Do you accept?" Eve quickly said "Yes." "Very well." the voice told her before she blacked out. When she awoke, she found herself somewhere completely different. wondering where she was, she wanders around now, trying to find the owner of the voice

EX Mode: Hero From Shinra: "Let's run wild!" Eve turns into a mixture of Bionic Commando, a Mecha(Similar to Gurren Lagann), and a Demon(From Devilman) In this form she gains the ability to use ether Range-only attacks or Close-only attack along with these:
HP Recovery
AP Drain
Assist Attack UP

Ryu was wandering a dark location with marks in the floor as if lightning struck it.

Ryu looks to his left to see a creature in his form come up to him and he says "Damn. Another one of those things."

They both charged each other and locked swords. They continued sword dueling until Ryu jumps back and holds out his hand.

He then fires a powerful gust of wind and blast it with everything he's got. The creature simply got up and did the same thing he did.

Ryu was thinking "If I don't end this soon, I'll be too weak to beat my old man." He then unleashes his sword and infuses it with wind and strikes the copy down with one swing.

He then says "This is getting annoying. I have to find the old man soon before these things get to me first." He then rushes to an open area with light that cover the entire room.

Ryu looked around and he said "I guess I'll rest here." He then set up his camp and he thought about why he was here.

He wonder what called him here and why he was chosen instead of somebody else. He eventually call it a day and went to sleep.

Suddenly, rumbling is heard as a girl is thrown into a building. The young teenager got up from the wreckage as a young teenage boy continued fighting a tall man in front of him.

The man then says "Step aside runt, I'm going to finish this." The boy replied "No! I won't let you hurt her anymore!"

The man just laughs and says "You actually think you have a chance? I must have hit you harder than I thought."

The boy was in pain and the man said "If you truly think you can beat me, then get stronger and win!"

The girl appeared behind him with her spear raised but he saw her out of the corner of his eye and he stabbed her in the heart with his broadsword.

The boy was shocked and in a fit of rage, he attempted to stab him but the man sidestepped him and hit him with the back of his hand.

The man then said "Like I said, if you want to beat me, get stronger runt!" Those were the last words he said before he wandered off. Ryu woke up in a sweat.

He then thought "Damn. Why now of all times to show that dream?" He blamed himself for not protecting his friend and she died because of it.

He was no longer the weak runt he use to be and he was going to prove it. He then gathered his things and proceeded to wander the darkness that laid in front of him.

info.brief_description: Travel through the world of dissidia as your own sonic characters.
info.description:
This is basically Final Fantasy Dissidia but with sonic characters.

This idea was inspired by a user on fanfiction.net named DJ-SlashMusika21.

I want to thank him for this idea and the inspiration for a few other things.

I want you guys to make as many characters as you can come up with.

You will send your characters on a journey as learn more about your creativity skills.

Have your character go on a emotional journey and discover his/herself in a new light.

I just want to say that if you want more info on final fantasy dissidia, check out wikipedia or youtube.

I also want to say that I'm low on ideas so if you have a character for my story, then send him or her in so I can continue.

I want to say that the next chapter after selecting a game title is nothing more than me describing that character's journey in the game.

It's has no bearing on what your character should be like. Just to let you know, you can visit my deviantart account to learn when I'm going to update the main story.

My account is dragon68. The same as the account name here.
